# Very Basic

## DESCRIPTION
> Sometimes, we need to oscillate To and fro? things become tough when interwoven together.

key.txt 
```txt
  
```

> **FLAG FORMAT**: DSC{[A-Za-z0-9_]+}


## Solution
* A pretty guessy challenge
* Using [CyberChef](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/) to Vignere decode with `KEY` as the key
* Recipe for cyberchef
```
Vigen√®re_Decode('KEY')
From_Base32('A-Z2-7=',false)
From_Base32('A-Z2-7=',false)
From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9+/=',true,false)
From_Base32('A-Z2-7=',false)
From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9+/=',true,false)
From_Base32('A-Z2-7=',false)
From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9+/=',true,false)
From_Base32('A-Z2-7=',false)
From_Base32('A-Z2-7=',false)
From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9+/=',true,false)
```
* Flag:  
`DSC{V17_P0L1CY}`
